name: Leading The Great Duel - A card crashers game
name_original: Leading The Great Duel - A card crashers game
description:
You play as Gipp, a combat robot in training. Gipp is tasked with defeating as many enemies as possible before going down. It's fine though. He's a robot and thus is infinitely repairable. 

Tip: The dash is invincible, can delete enemy bullets, and can damage enemies. 

Use it to avoid attacks that are cornering you!

Controls

Left/right: Movement

Up/Down: Aim up and down

Down: Drop down jumpthrough platforms

Z: Jump

X: Dash

C: Fire

V: Change weapon

Gamepad controls:

Left/right: Movement

Up/Down: Aim up and down

Down: Drop down jumpthrough platforms

A: Jump

B: dash

X: Fire

Y: Switch weapon
